attr.title: Super Glitter Rush
attr.desc:
Super Glitter Rush is a boss-rush style bullet hell shoot-em-up!

30 cute and unique bosses are waiting for you in a colorful world of pixel art.
The hail of bullets might look hard.
But don't worry.
With special bullets that catch your opponent's bullets, you can shoot them all back!
The more you catch, the stronger you get!
attr.desc_md:
**Super Glitter Rush** is a boss-rush style bullet hell shoot-em-up!

30 cute and unique bosses are waiting for you in a colorful world of pixel art. The hail of bullets might look hard, but don't worry. With special bullets that catch your opponent's bullets, you can shoot them all back! The more you catch, the stronger you get!

- 30 unique bosses!
- 8 playable characters with different abilities!
- Supercute chiptune soundtrack!
attr.inst:
Purchase the port on Steam and copy game files into assets folder. 
The game is also sold on Itch.io and it comes with Steam key as well.
attr.inst_md:
1. Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1338020/) or [itch.io](https://tinycactus.itch.io/superglitterrush)
2. Copy the game files into the `ports/superglitter/gamedata` folder
